perturbation.original_text:
This Sponsorship Agreement (this “Agreement”) is entered into as of November 27, 2017 (the “Execution Date”) by and between
Jacksonville Jaguars, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“Club”), and The ARC Group, Inc., a Florida corporation (owner and operator of
Dick’s Wings and Grill) (“Sponsor”). This Agreement consists of this Sponsorship Agreement and Exhibits A and B hereto, each of which is
incorporated into and forms a part of this Agreement by this reference.
perturbation.changed_text:
This Sponsorship Agreement (this “Agreement”) is entered into as of November 27, 2017 (the “Execution Date”) by and between
Jacksonville Jaguars, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“Club”), and The ARC Group, Inc., a Florida corporation (owner and operator of
Dick’s Wings and Grill) (“Partner”). This Agreement consists of this Sponsorship Agreement and Exhibits A and B hereto, each of which is
incorporated into and forms a part of this Agreement by this reference.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Sponsor' with 'Partner' in the introductory paragraph. This creates ambiguity because the term 'Sponsor' is still used throughout the rest of the document, creating uncertainty as to which entity the contract refers to in different sections.

perturbation.original_text:
Sponsor shall be responsible for the
management and control over the services provided by its staff members operating the Stands (“Sponsor Staff”) and Sponsor
shall be solely responsible for determining the terms of employment for Sponsor Staff. Sponsor shall train Sponsor Staff or
require Sponsor Staff to undergo training provided by Concessionaire. The staffing levels at each Stand shall be subject to
Club’s approval.
perturbation.changed_text:
Partner shall be responsible for the
management and control over the services provided by its staff members operating the Stands (“Sponsor Staff”) and Contractor
shall be solely responsible for determining the terms of employment for Sponsor Staff. Partner shall train Sponsor Staff or
require Sponsor Staff to undergo training provided by Concessionaire. The staffing levels at each Stand shall be subject to
Club’s approval.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Sponsor' with 'Partner' and 'Contractor' in the section concerning staffing. This introduces confusion because 'Sponsor Staff' is still used, while now 'Partner' and 'Contractor' are used at the beginning of each sentence. There are three different terms with no clarification of what the proper terminology to use is.

perturbation.original_text:
During each Contract Year, Sponsor shall be the presenting sponsor of a video feature that highlights a
top rushing play by a Team player during each preseason and regular season Team Game (the “Feature”). The top rushing play
shall be determined by Club in its sole discretion. Such presenting sponsorship shall consist of the following:
i. A Sponsor Mark displayed in the Feature, which shall be published by Club to Club’s official Facebook, Twitter,
Instagram or Snapchat account. The post will tag Sponsor’s official corresponding social media account. The content,
timing and frequency of such social media posts and the social media platforms shall be determined by Club.
perturbation.changed_text:
During each Contract Year, Partner shall be the presenting advertiser of a video feature that highlights a
top rushing play by a Team player during each preseason and regular season Team Game (the “Feature”). The top rushing play
shall be determined by Club in its sole discretion. Such presenting advertisement shall consist of the following:
i. A Sponsor Mark displayed in the Feature, which shall be published by Club to Club’s official Facebook, Twitter,
Instagram or Snapchat account. The post will tag Partner’s official corresponding social media account. The content,
timing and frequency of such social media posts and the social media platforms shall be determined by Club.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Sponsor' with 'Partner' and 'sponsorship' with 'advertisement' in the section concerning digital benefits. This introduces confusion because 'Sponsor Mark' is still used, while now 'Partner' and 'advertisement' are used at the beginning of each sentence. The digital benefits section uses different terms now and with no clarification of what the proper terminology to use is.
perturbation.location: Section 3. Digital, Subsection C. Social Media Feature
